name: Whale Shark Encounter
description:
You don’t need to travel that far, actually in the season (May to September) around one hour from Cancun by boat you can find dozens if not hundreds of them feeding on the planktons close to the surface. 

This is the world’s biggest known Whale Shark congregation and it is happening every single year, so your chances to see the biggest fish in the world will not get better than this.
